mydata.file=/home/tiphaine/Documents/git_iop/package_R/coMET/inst/extdata/gata4_55probes_info.txt
disp.mydata=TRUE
mydata.format=site
sample.labels=Methylation
symbols=circle-fill
mydata.ref=cg25216696
color.list=red
pval.threshold=1e-06
start=11532468
end=11619511
lab.Y=log
disp.association=FALSE
disp.regionD=FALSE
mydata.large.file=/home/tiphaine/Documents/git_iop/package_R/coMET/inst/extdata/gata4_95probes_info.txt
mydata.large.format=SITE
sample.labels.large=Outside
color.list.large=grey 
symbols.large=circle-fill
disp.association.large=FALSE
disp.region.large=FALSE
list.tracks=transcriptENSEMBL,CGI,ChromHMM,DNAse,RegENSEMBL,SNP
cormatrix.file=CORMATRIX.FILE=/home/tiphaine/Documents/git_iop/package_R/coMET/inst/extdata/gata4_55probes_rawMatrix.txt
disp.cormatrixmap=TRUE
cormatrix.method=spearman
cormatrix.format=raw
colormatrix.color.scheme=bluewhitered
disp.phys.dist=TRUE
disp.color.bar=TRUE
disp.legend=TRUE
image.type=eps
dips.mult.lab.X=FALSE
image.title="Example a-DMR in GATA4 gene in adipose tissue"
image.name=/home/tiphaine/Documents/git_iop/package_R/coMET/inst/extdata/gata_comet_55probes_large_article
image.size=7
genome=hg19
dataset.gene=hsapiens_gene_ensembl
